features: ELEVATED SUPPORT AND COMFORT: Supports Up to 240 Lbs. The donut pillow offers a medium level of firmness. For optimal comfort, use the donut pillow on firm seating surfaces such as your office chair, dining room chair, car, or stadium seat.

SEAT CUSHION FOR SITTING COMFORT: Effective donut pillow for sitting long hours to make your day more comfortable meaning you can be more productive when it matters. Commonly used to help with tailbone pain, hemorrhoids, post surgery and postpartum essentials.

EVEN WEIGHT DISTRIBUTION: The seat pillow is engineered with ComfortSupport foam and BounceBack technology to provide the balance you need between supporting you on the chair surface and the comfort to sit frustration-free.

SUITABLE FOR MOST SEATS: Lightweight and portable for use at home and on the go. Use as office chair cushion, car seat cushion, or wheelchair cushion. This donut seat cushion can accommodate a seat with the size of 17.5" x 14", making any hard surface comfortable to use.

PHYSICAL THERAPIST ENDORSED BRAND: We have the seal of approval from leading physical therapist, founder and owner of Therapy Network, Inc., Bob Schrupp, PT, MA and Brad Heineck, PT, C.S.C.S. Don’t compromise with inferior cushions when it comes to your comfort.
IN THE PRESS: As Seen On CBS, FOX, NBC, USA TODAY, Health, Bob & Brad Physical Therapy. Trusted by 500,000+ satisfied customers. Makes a great gift for loved ones.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sitting Relief Where You Need It Most Previous page Next page
Discover Why the Ergonomic Innovations Donut Pillow is Different

What size is the donut pillow? The Ergonomic Innovations donut pillow offers generous outer dimensions of 17.5" x 13.8" with a thickness of 2.75". The central inner hole measures 7" x 4.5". What weight does the pillow support? The supportive, high density polyurethane foam core supports weights up to 240 lbs (108kg) Can I wash the pillow? For optimum hygiene the pillow comes with a removable, machine washable cover. The inner foam cannot be machine washed. How do I use the donut pillow so it is positioned correctly? Place the donut on any hard seating surface (office chair, dining room chair etc) with the "U" cut outs placed towards the front and back of your seat. For tailbone pain relief your coccyx should be suspended over the "U" to provide sitting relief. What makes the Ergonomic Innovations cushion different? Over 750,000 people just like you have tried and trusted the Ergonomic Innovations pillow for superior sitting relief. Using BounceBack Foam Technology you can rely on sitting support day after day after day. Highly resilient and durable to last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used these pillows at home,on airplanes and they are comfortable and relieve low back pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I haven't loved using donut pillows in the past, but I used this while recovering from surgery and it was a game changer!! Made it so much easier to sit down anywhere. The hole in the middle is bigger than others that I've tried, and the material is great. Some donut pillows add extra pressure but this one doesn't! I also love that you can take the cover off to wash it. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable. Has made my body feel better. One problem, there is a smell (odor) that is not very pleasant. I removed the cover and it is not just the cover. I hung the entire donut pillow in an airy place over night. Smell is less but not gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, firm donut pillow
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, nice firm pillow. Sure beats a drugstore inflatable donut pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have an injured tail bone this is an essential tool for pain relief while sitting.
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing I dislike about this pillow. The underside of the pillow is white so, you can see if it gets dirty. And you can remove and wash the pillow casing.The center hole is retangular, and because of this you can position it as you like. If your behind is narrow you can position it with the hole elongated. If you are heavy set then you would position it the long retangular way.It is a wonderful tool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little on the small size
reviews.reviewText: I have been using an old computer chair for the last 20 years and the cushioning is all but nonexistent so i bought this to replace the pillow i've been sitting on. Overall it's a very dense but comfortable foam. The footprint, or should i say buttprint, is a little on the small size. I'm not a small dude but i'm also not a huge dude. i find that it is just big enough but feels like it could be an extra couple inches on all sides. It also could use another inch or two of padding. Clearly it's not meant as a long term solution but it works and probably makes an excellent short term pad for maybe a wooden dining chair or someone working for short periods of time at a desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Ergonomic Cushion
reviews.reviewText: The cushion gives great support and is very comfortable. Exactly as promised.
Me costó algo acostumbrarme, pero después de varios días de uso me gustó. Es práctico, también es cómodo para permanecer en posición de flor de loto. Peso 80 kilos, complexión media, trasero normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024

reviews.reviewText: The item arrived wrapped in an unsealed flimsy polythene bag, without official labels, packaging, manuals etc. Item has clear signs of previous use and I suspect it was a returned one. The product does not bear any logo as shown in the description. This is not the advertised product for sure.
Very comfortable and smooth texture with strong bearing capacity.

reviews.reviewTitle: A la fois ferme et doux
reviews.reviewText: Ferme et doux à la fois. Il aurait été un peu plus épais, ça aurait été bien
